website_summaries.verdict: Gives you a pretty good value for a durable dual-basket system with 8 game modes.
pros: Has the ESPN brand name, which youngsters will love to see
Includes audio and sound effects to enhance play
Uses all-metal frame for a unit that will stand up to rough play
cons: Very difficult to fold up for storage

customer_reviews.title: Good but be warned that the sound might disappear
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game for all ages. It took my sister and I about an hour to assemble it but we checked for all parts before starting. After having the basketball game for about a month the sound stopped working. We tried to change batteries and plugging and unplugging but nothing. Every now and then the sound comes on for a few seconds. The sound is so great when working. A little disappointed but still enjoy the game
customer_reviews.author: Miss Yang

customer_reviews.title: So much fun- however...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the grandkids and it was a hit! Everyone played- old and young. Took my husband 3 hours to assemble. Missing key parts. Description said there are locking casters for ease of rolling- no casters. This thing is huge and folds in half. After one day the scoring paddle in the left hoop quit working. We will need to see if they make this right when I call into customer support. Needs more than 4 balls if two players over the age of 8 are playing. A little high for 3 yr olds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scoreboard dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun however the scoreboard never worked from the start. Asked for a new scoreboard but they want you to send the entire thing back. Not cool I should only have to build it once.
customer_reviews.author: VBarnett

customer_reviews.title: This basketball hoop was not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: This basketball hoop was not bad but not great. What would make the design better is if the return section of the game had poles that ran down each side so that the return wasn't so flimsy. Also, after less than a month, the score keeper quit having sound. Tried changing the batteries, unplugging and replugging back in...nothing worked. Once in a while the sound will randomly work but rarely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome! My son was thrilled to get this for his 12th birthday. He and my teen daughter played for hours! For the price, its great; even if it only lasts for a year before it starts falling apart or they get bored with it. I was a little intimidated when I got the package and opened the box. A lot of pieces. But each piece has a little sticker on it with a number and the instructions indicate which piece by number to use in each step. If you can assemble IKEA furniture, then you can do this! :) It took me about 2 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kay

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than we expected!! We had to change set up places upon taking everything out of the box. We have had lots of fun, used it at a kids party and everyone had a blast. We compete as a family almost everyday. Can play various games, more than 2 players and different time countdowns. Well worth it's money and would definitely buy it again! The only con is that you can only score 99 and that's it. Would be more awesome if it could be triple digit.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our children at Christmas. We read every review on every pop-a-shot out there. We have drop ceiling tiles in our basement, so height was a concern as well. We agonized over this purchase, but in the end, I'm SO pleased we purchased this one. It fits perfect, the scoreboard works great, and our kids are having a blast with it. Only problem is, the kids beat me every time!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leurck

customer_reviews.title: Super quality with one exception
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice game built with exceptional quality with one exception. The counter arm under the basket is plastic and is a definite design flaw. It’s too bad because everything else is made extremely well. Putting it together I was very impressed with quality and design. We’ve had one arm snap and it was replaced quickly and without hassle. Would still recommend but be prepared to replace the counter arm. If that was metal or thicker plastic I’d give this game 5 stars plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and a friend put this together. He said you need 2 people. It took them about an hour. The kids and adults love this! This game is played alot. It's big so I dont see this working well in really small spaces but if you have the room it'll be great. Two people playing against each other is fun. It has wheel locks on it which is good because the constant throwing will mess up your walls. We didnt notice the wheel locks until 2 days after playing and our walls had holes from the screws but thats our fault we didnt notice the wheel locks.
customer_reviews.author: J Sueno

customer_reviews.title: ... for about 1 month now and it is working great. My 10 year old son loves it and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had for about 1 month now and it is working great. My 10 year old son loves it and we play quite regularly as a family. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mileski

customer_reviews.title: Electronic box breaks quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun the first couple months. Then the electronic box broke and it’s impossible to figure out how to contact this company for a replacement. You would think for as much $ as you spent on this that the box would work longer. Now it’s past the point to return it. I will not be buying anything else from This company.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Received this game just before a family/friends party, what a blast. Everyone had fun. While it does not pop together in an instant, if you set out the pieces like instructions say and have a ratchet wrench the assembly will go pretty smooth. We had occasion to contact the seller when one of our friends slam-dunked a ball resulting in a snapped-off score paddle. Seller was polite and fast in shipping us a replacement piece. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: caboshores

customer_reviews.title: The best game ever
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell you how great this item is. It is high quality and our event was a huge success with people lined up to shoot. It was so good that one of the attendees bought it from us!
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: OK So Far
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straightforward. My wife & I got it together in about 2 hours, Instructions were pretty good. The "how to play" instructions are a bit brief. I bought this one as opposed to the cheaper alternatives bacause this one referenced telephone and web support while reviews for the cheap ones indicate no such support. Plus the tubing is over 50% larger, so should be more stable. Grandkids will try it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The game itself is fun but it's no fun if you can't play two ...
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fun but it's no fun if you can't play two player. After having this for less than 5 days, 2 of the buttons stopped working which control your selection of different games and multiplayer. So now all we can play is one game and on one player which takes all the fun out. I thought maybe it was the batteries going bad but once they were changed I still had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. 10/11 yr olds love it, and so do the adults
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This was a Christmas present for my 10 yr old son. He loves it and so do we! There are different games to play (maybe 9? I can't remember). It has 2 hoops and 4 basketballs. It has held up to multiple kids and adults playing. Make sure to measure your space! I measured a million times, and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: This was great for the first couple months of using it
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first couple months of using it. Over time it really starts to wear down because of its aluminum frame. If you’re looking for a long term basketball hoop, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: naomisopt

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 13 year old for Easter. He helped my brother-in-law put it together. They did say assembly took longer than expected but once it was up it's been getting a lot of use. He enjoys playing with his friends and it's a good size for his age. I think he will get a few years use out of it. It folds up but we have the space to leave it open and it's very sturdy. Great value especially for the price would definitely recommend and buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia K.

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday party as a side activity for whomever. We left it up in the garage, and basically every time me or my son walks by, we shoot some hoops. My accuracy is not getting any better, but that's no fault of the game. I also took this to Halloween party with a bunch of adults, only too the scoreboard off and folded up the rest as one piece. Fit tightly in my Land Rover LR3, but it worked. The game was used most of the night and in to the morning. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great Hoops
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my step son. Over exceeded my expectations. Great value for the money. Recommend this if your looking for an alternative that is entertainment for kids. Mine is 13 and him and his buds love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Item came with defective features
customer_reviews.text: This has been a frustrating purchase for me. The original item came with a badly mis-shaped rim on one side. Also the scoring electronics would constantly short out and reset. I contacted amazon and they sent another unit but its really large and heavy and was frustrating to have to reassemble all over again. I'd plan on at least 1 hour to 1.5 hours to assemble and install. I wouldn't buy this particular brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Huge but we like it
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband 5 hours to put together and even tho we premeasured it out, it’s HUGE! But my 2 and 4 year old sons really love it. It’s too big but they love trying to make baskets and will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Favali

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked about this is that it took so long to put together! But that's definitely not a bad thing. It's a big game so it takes some time, and I anticipated that when I bought it. It took about two hours to put together. It was really big, which I loved. I didn't want something really dinky. I'm 5'5 and my boyfriend is 6'7 and we both play it, so it's really good for any size. I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Rae

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Great Value, My Kids Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We've had the ESPN indoor basketball game for a couple of months, and been really happy with the product. We've owned other similar sets in the past, but the quality on this one is much higher. It was very easy to set up, and the instructions were straightforward. The kids love it, and it gets a lot of use. Its also got a really great "game mode" (other sets really lack in this area). This has been one of the best products we've found on Amazon in awhile. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Micah Carioto

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered and we put it together in 3 hours. The instructions are straight forward but take time. We had three people put it together. Two were teens. It went very well. The unit is lots of fun. The kids have not stopped playing it since it arrived. The only issue we really have is the back. The screws are puncturing holes in our wall. We pull it off the wall but it pushes back on with play. Great fun for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Conley

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It’s ok, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. It’s solid, and well built but not worth $175. It needs more balls, 4 is not enough for 2 people to play. Also, you have to slow your shots down and wait for the scoring paddle to bounce back. If you shoot to quick it won’t register the shot. Unfortunately it needs infrared scoring to make it worth the cost. FYI-it’s $50 at sams club now. :(
customer_reviews.author: biggris

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great if we could ever put it together
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great if we could ever put it together. This was a Christmas present for our 9 year old twins and we went to set it up and half the nuts and bolts were missing from the box. So it's now just sitting in the basement waiting on parts that should've been in the box. We also had to buy an air pump because the air pump that comes with this did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Product is good, but Seller will give out your private info
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but the seller provided my personal phone number to a company called "Metal Sports", who called me asking me to participate in an incentive program the company is currently offering. I have no interest in participating in this and I am, quite frankly, appalled that the seller shared my information and/or used it to make an unsolicited call. Very disturbing! I WILL NOT be buying from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son for Christmas (he’s 7) and he absolutely loves it! Actually, our entire family loves to play together! Only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because the button/device you use to start the game ALWAYS falls off in the middle of the game you’re playing. It is super annoying, but I would still recommended the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our After School Program kids and the kids went crazy when they played it and had so much fun. I just hope it will last through the abuse of the kids. Took a while to assemble as the tools provided were too basic. You will be better off purchasing more balls. I got 3 more and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Daybidcho

customer_reviews.title: Fun entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a couple months so far and it has definitely gotten used quite a bit by my 3 children. It’s fun and provides them with some good entertainment and time together. I really like how it has a space saving feature. I’m a bit surprised at how much smaller it gets when it’s folded. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: thos25

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match description
customer_reviews.text: Not what is pictured....dimensions dont match nor does the colors. Cheap looking and junk....didnt get.led scoring....not.what is pictured
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great so far!
customer_reviews.text: It says two people, I put this together alone, so far so good. Although the pole on the bottom tends to move on it’s own, I think it’s labeled #10? It’s pretty sturdy. I just used the pictures to put it together, not tooooo challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Vrizzy Prater

customer_reviews.title: Missing critical pieces
customer_reviews.text: Missing a critical setup part. Now we're hoping that it arrives in the next day or so (requested the part 2 weeks ago) and that no other pieces are missing. This was supposed to be the big Christmas gift. Now we may have to scramble last minute for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: WorkinMomma

customer_reviews.title: Entertains for hours.
customer_reviews.text: We opened this on Christmas and have played with it every day. Good quality with fun game setting. Pretty easy to assebmle as well. We need to get more ball since we find ourselves fighting over the open ball quite frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Electronics failed in three weeks after Christmas. Should have heeded the warnings on others reviews but it was nice little if the electronics didn't fail. Swapped batteries,tested batteries, unplugged all of the connectors and plugged back in. Still won't come on. Contacted support through Amazon and they thought I was trying to watch a basketball game on TV. Will not buy these kind of products on Amazon any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Villalta

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love it and so do we! Checked to make sure all equipment was there Before putting together. Pros: Easy to assemble Sturdy All equipment in working order Cons: The attachment to operate the game is easily knocked off.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product is fairly well made, easy to put together (should use 2 people if possible) and a lot of fun. Within a few days, the score board went out. I simply followed the steps in the manual, contacted the manufacturer, and they sent me a new one for free. Essentially they give you free parts for life from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, great quality, non-stop fun as well as a great workout ,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a family gift for Christmas. Asssembly instructions were well written. It took me a few hours to assemble but I was working on my own. The finished product amazing. The family loves it from agars 7 - 50.....
customer_reviews.author: Donny B

customer_reviews.title: Date night worthy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help pass the time away during quarantine for my family. My 8 and 6 yr old love to play, but honestly I think my brother and I like to play the most. I have even played other moms during play dates. This thing rocks. Easy to fold and move around. The multiply game options is a great way to change things up. Only negative thing I would say is that the control pad that starts the game always falls off during intense play.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Senisi

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this set-up for months now and are still enjoying it. Really like that it has 8 different games to play and of course that it’s 2-player. It’s holding up well, even during the most competitive of games. It’s fun for all ages and now, during Covid, it’s become one of our favorite pastimes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product and easy to assemble. The fold in feature is great for storing out of the way. Me and my kids love it!! The only thing I noticed was on the back of the top rods, where you screw in the screws, it sticks out a little, so I just placed some pipe insulation around the bars so that there wouldn't be any wall damage since ours is against a wall in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: and the Game is pretty awesome when it works
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this item, and the Game is pretty awesome when it works. I have had the game for a couple months, and the scoreboard kept flickering on and off from jumpstart...now it doesn’t even turn on. The game is pretty useless without the scoreboard, so not worth the price. When it works...it’s worth every penny...very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best $100 investment - This Basketball goal is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The asemble took over a hour. My husband and I love this goal. The moment we got it up we started playing. The balls are a little low for adults BUT that hasn’t stopped up the past 3 days . Defintly would buy again. We also had all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Most of these basketball games were too tall for our playroom, but not this one. This one was short enough to fit and it works great. We have been playing it for months now and have not had any issues with it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Leffel

customer_reviews.title: Tried to school my son!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it thinking I’ll school my son and daughter. 7 year old boy is now man of the house. Wish it came with more balls, but I’ll buy some!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in tact and it took few hours to assemble, instructions where clear. Once setup my 8 year old got the display working by himself it is that easy and I am really happy we got this in time for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: LAKS

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed my son has had to make two trips to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed my son has had to make two trips to home depot because package was missing multiple bolts needed for construction. I went with the higher priced game thinking I would avoid this very thing.
customer_reviews.author: davis

customer_reviews.title: Flashy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love how well this is designed and how durable it is. The construction of the frame is very sturdy and the controls are easy to use. This has become the focal point of our game room for kids and adults! Love the score board and net design.
customer_reviews.author: PersnicketyNiketyPrice

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product bought it as a replacement for one I had from another company and although they were similar in assembly and operation I found this one to be a better product due to the hight and positioning of the two rims, My son and I really liked the placement where is was not as close to the ceiling in which we could use more of an arch as opposed to the other, and the basketball court look a like return net is very cool. recommended buy for adults and children.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a Christmas gift. When it was opened and nearly completely assembled it was discovered that one goal had eight net hooks and the other had seven. The two nets that were provided we’re also different sizes. Only one net worked with the goals; the other was too small. There is no information provided to contact the manufacturer. Had to search the internet for a net that would work with the two different goals. Very disappointed with the entire situation!
customer_reviews.author: Larry W. Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome indoor sports equipment for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a birthday gift for my son thinking it will be cold here in next couple of month and kids would need some indoor activity to burn sugar but they are already busy indoors :-) ... Both my kids 6 & 9 loved it! It was very easy to assemble, with multiple game option it keeps your entertained. I feel its even good product for parties, as most of the games support multi-players. Both kids and adults can enjoy! Highly recommends the product.
customer_reviews.author: sks

customer_reviews.title: Whole family LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my husband! Looks like a real arcade one as opposed to some other brands in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: fun game!
customer_reviews.text: such a fun game to have in the office! we all pitched in and everyone is stoked on it!
customer_reviews.author: HB-Local

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Pay attention to the dimmemsions better than what I did, this thing is HUGE! Lots of fun after we found a spot for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey2381

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I mean I thought it would be better quality but it’s not awful a piece was broke when we got it but I’m terrible at returning things. I personally wouldn’t buy again or reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Luvnlucky

customer_reviews.title: IT SHIPPED FAST
customer_reviews.text: THE ESPN E-Z BASKETBALL GAME - SETUP WAS VERY EZ- WORKED VERY WELL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: took about 3 hours to put together but Well worth it. all parts are marked just remember bolt, washer, washer and,screw, Great project for son and mother to do.
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Right side hoop broke
customer_reviews.text: The right side hoop never worked right. It then totally broke and doesn't work at all. Also the panel with the buttons always falls down. It was a fun game when it worked, but unreliable .
customer_reviews.author: Real Good Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift. It looks nice, works well and folds up for easy storage. My only gripe is the buttons sometimes stick a little bit. Other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for whole family
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase especially now that it's hard for k I ds to go outside. Helps the whole family get some physical activity indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Electronics Busted after 90 days
customer_reviews.text: 3 months of used minimally, and already the electronics do not work at all -- NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Dad of 5 !

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is gonna love it! No problems putting together and all parts there!
customer_reviews.author: Faye T McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the whole family Only thing I don’t like is that it slides too easily on carpet even with wheels locked Otherwise great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product a couple of months ago. It was easy to assemble and easy to fold and move likewise. We bought this for are grandchildren ranging in age from 4 to 16 years of age and they all loved it as well as the adults, great time for all ages would strongly recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! We had to do some bedroom rearranging because it’s enormous. Easy to assemble, the folding is a two person operation.
customer_reviews.author: CRF

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at the Price Point
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product with a very sturdy frame. We were very impressed with how nice the poly backboard was and the scoring system is very easy to understand. Be sure to allocate time for assembly because it can be pretty involved but it is worth the effort. We bought this for our son and ended up playing it for hours ourselves. This also arrived exactly as described. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This game is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this game for my Man Cave. We love it. Easy to assemble, loads of fun, and the most used game in the cave. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great product my 10 and 12 year old boys love it. Definitely is not very easy to put together. Takes a few hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Paris

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality and the price. It was easy to assemble, although time consuming... give yourself at least 2 hours and use a ratchet or a good wrench, the little wrench they give you will give you fits. It works well, feels sturdy. No issues with the scoring, the balls are good, backboard is true, rims are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for almost a year now. Doesnt get used every day but holding up beautifully! Just the right size for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: NATHAN

customer_reviews.title: Have some fun and shoot some hoops!  Live a little with your kids and grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: All the kids and grandchildren were home for Thanksgiving and we had lots of fun with this. I'd buy it again, and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Stephens

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: KIds love this even us adults do. Pricing is amazing and product is sweet. No idea how they make any money at there price.
customer_reviews.author: gary jakober

customer_reviews.title: Great Durability and Gameplay!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this "pop-a-shot" style game for the apartment community that I manage and it has held up through vigorous "testing" by our residents. The durability of this is amazing as it has been played heavily everyday since purchase and has not shown any signs of wear and tear. I'll be sure to recommend this game to my fellow apartment communities when asking for recommendations!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balls don’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot of fun. But I gave it 3 stars because of the balls. The don’t hold air. And the pump it can with sucks. I now have to go buy balls separately. The whole thing is great, just sucks the balls suck.
customer_reviews.author: Wakeboard_Boot

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and sturdy but
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and sturdy but, missing several bolts and screws. Bought it about a month ago and still waiting on back order parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Ross

customer_reviews.title: Does need two people to fold close
customer_reviews.text: Product was received earlier than promised, which was awesome, and the boxing content was in excellent condition. I found the instruction and assembly where easy to follow and perform. The product is well made and light making it easy to move. The only challenge I have is closing the unit when by myself, it is possible to close it alone, but it is an effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Arcade quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our play/ arcade room! Wanted something that was sturdy since it would be used quite a bit by adults and kids of all ages! The games and sound effects on it are awesome as well. Feels like we are at an arcade!
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: great fun..arcade fun
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for my grandson and grand daughters..it turned out to be a gift for everybody as its the hit of the party..creates fun family wars..lol..get it..yes
customer_reviews.author: raybo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids..
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, delivered fast, very clear instructions. Pretty good quality, my only complaint is one of the screws came defective.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service I will dispute the charge with my bank!
customer_reviews.text: Tried giving 0 stars. I purchased this item in may however, I just recently tried setting up. Sadly it is missing parts and I am unable to assemble. Also pre-drilled holes in wrong spot for part 2. Tried calling for help was advised return window has experience however, I was not calling to return, instead I was calling for help with my issue.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons aged 8 & 11 loved this Christmas present and their dad and grandpa and ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons aged 8 & 11 loved this Christmas present and their dad and grandpa and uncle liked it too. Came in many pieces but went together with not too much trouble. Sturdy. Folds into a manageable size for moving.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Valley Library

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great quality and really well made. This item comes with 4 real basketballs, not rubber ones that come with sets for younger kids. I have 9-year old twins and they absolutely love it! Measure your space before you assemble because it does take up a lot of room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for 'March Madness' ...work fundraiser and everyone was excited to play it. The 2 gentlemen that won were so happy they waited for their break, folded it down and took it home immediately. It's been a little over 2 months and the gentleman that won one of the games told me he plays it almost every day with his grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the grandkids and they love it. They are hard on toys and this seems to holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise
customer_reviews.text: Love that my 7 year grandson enjoys playing with it and the adults love getting into the action too .Good exercise on Rainey days !! It’s very sturdy and will have this game around for long time !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 💭 "Definitely press add to cart"💭
customer_reviews.text: We had this installed in my husband's mancave. We are extremely impressed. This is definitely a rewarding steal to pass the time with, and what an amazing price. We chose to have it installed by an Amazon pro who was time efficient and friendly. He also gave me a call the day before to confirm the exact time with me. Well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: London Bishhh 😍😜

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about 4 months with very little use.
customer_reviews.text: We thought this would be a great gift for children who love competition and basketball. However, it stopped working after only a few months of light use. Very disappointed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S Bertani

customer_reviews.title: Very good value here. Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Really Happy with the purchase. Assembly is NOT easy (some tiny screws), and the game play feature is really confusing. But for pure fun. It was a home run. 8 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Basketball game
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game it took some time to put together but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a ESPN EZ fold 2 players basketball game and I received a darkboard cabinet. This was the only gift my children had for Christmas. I waited to opened until the last day so my kids did not find out what the gift was. It is really disappointed that my children’s Christmas was ruined because of a mistake like this.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the basketball game for my husband's man cave. I received it rather quickly. I assembled it in less than an hour. It is very sturdy. The directions were extremely simple to follow. I would purchase other items from this company in the future. My husband loves it. I can't keep him away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherese Rawls

customer_reviews.title: It held up to the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: This basketball game is very sturdy and the quality is exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Val in the O-NE

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Except for not having all the nuts ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Except for not having all the nuts and washers we needed! Imagine how I felt on Christmas Eve putting this together for my boys, and not able to because of the missing pieces. I had to take apart other items that luckily had the same size nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Not to bad to put together. The kids and I have a lot of fun playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!!! Everyone in the family just walks by it and can’t pass it up, so much better than always being on the phones.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everything was thought of in design. Cords hidden or velcroed in, multiple game functions, strong materials, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our four kids - 10, 8, 6, 3 - for an Easter present and they love it. It was pretty easy to put together and it slides nicely into a spot in our garage when we put it away. None of them have beaten me yet, but maybe one day!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Great product with hours of fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very rarely the ball gets slightly stuck in the hoop and may not record the basket. Generally works very well and the target box is quite accurate. The build quality is not as robust but adequate for hours of game time.
customer_reviews.author: Aneel Akbar Chowdhary

customer_reviews.title: Best family fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this gift- my family do daily challenges and given there are eight game modes- no one ever gets bored . Make sure you have enough ceiling room to get better arch- I am 6’3 and have 7.5 foot basement ceiling and it works but if I had 8-9 feet I coukd Shoot further
customer_reviews.author: Wesley P.

product_meta.title: ESPN EZ Fold Indoor Basketball Game for 2 Players with LED Scoring and Arcade Sounds (6-Piece Set)
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Classic (Medium Density Fiberboard Backboard)

Simultaneous play

With the ESPN EZ Fold 2-Player Basketball Game, you can play alone or simultaneously with a competitor. The Electronic LED Scoring System with authentic arcade sounds gives shooters the adrenaline rush of a packed fieldhouse as they compete in 8 different skill games. When the weather or the time necessitate indoor activities, look no further than the ESPN EZ Fold Basketball Game. It keeps your shooting skills sharp and helps younger players develop hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.

Space-saving durability

Our innovative EZ Fold design lets you enjoy competitive, skill-building basketball shoot-outs at any hour and in spite of inclement outdoor weather. When not in use, the ESPN EZ Fold Basketball Game folds down to nearly half its size and takes up minimal space in your garage or guest room. The rust resistant 1.5"" steel frame is lightweight and clear polycarbonate backboard enhances the game's portability. With 3"" lockable casters, it rolls on tile, carpet and wood floors for easy transportation. This set comes complete with 4 basketballs and an air pump. 

Customer Satisfaction is our top priority

We insist on the highest quality materials and manufacturing processes to bring you this deluxe arcade style basketball game. We confidently offer a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee for your peace of mind. In the unlikely event that our product does not meet your expectations, return it for a 100% refund of your purchase price. No questions asked. 

Provide hours of home entertainment for your family and friends. Add the ESPN EZ Fold Basketball Game to your cart today.
feature_bullets: 6 PIECE SET includes the ESPN EZ-Fold Basketball Game Table, 7” basketballs(4) and 1 air pump
FOLDABLE DESIGN FOR EASY STORAGE: Saves nearly 30% more space than similar basketball games; built in locking system for storage mode to enhance safety; 3" lockable casters for easy transportation
ROBUST CONSTRUCTION: MDF backboard features two 12" steel rims with heavy duty nylon nets
LED ELECTRONIC SCORER WITH MULTIPLE GAME OPTIONS: Integrated LED scoring display and game clock; includes 8 great game options; requires 4 "AA" batteries (not included)
ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: 81"L x 48"W x 80.5"H. Folds down to just 48"L x 20"W x 80.5"H for easy storage or moving.
3D interactive assembly instructions for this product are available through the free BILT app.
